means: 不可说的，不应被讲出来的

sentence.Network_en: The judge described the offences as nauseating and unspeakable.
sentence.Network_cn: 法官将这些犯罪行为描述为“令人作呕、说不出口”。
疼起来厉害得无法形容。

sentence.Network_en: She suffered unspeakable trouble while she considered all these questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 她在考虑这一切问题时,心中有说不出的烦恼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: While he was yet in unspeakable agonies , the dwarf renewed their conversation ., 他还没来得及摆脱这种难言的痛苦时 , 矮子便又恢复了他们的谈话.

entry.tran: 恶劣得说不出口的；坏透了的
entry.def: If you describe something as unspeakable, you are emphasizing that it is extremely unpleasant.

example.tran: 化学武器难以名状的可怖
疼起来厉害得无法形容。

sentences.sentence: "an unspeakable odor came sweeping into the room"

means.word_mean: 恶劣得难以形容的;说不出口的,不可言状的

sentences.cn: 国王有无法形容的威严。

sentences.en: The unspeakable anguish wrung his heart.
sentences.cn: 难言的痛苦折磨着他的心。

sentences.en: She suffered unspeakable trouble while she considered all these questions.
